page.title: 17EMPLOYMENT:WOKINGHAM
page.content: Although a large part of the region is used for{farming}the number of people employed full time on farms is about 40, in summer about 50 others work part time. The{Industrial Estate}to the north west of the region provides employment in{light industrial establishments. A large{computer firm in the rural area employs about 300 people. The six{schools}employ teachers, ancillary staff, gardeners and cooks.{Public houses}employ bar and kitchen staff part time. The {riding stables}employ 5 people, a garage, car repair yards and a few small shops offer little employment. Most inhabitants{commute}to work outside the region, and there is little{unemployment.
